This is a Test

A simple markdown file where I test using hyperlinks and other nice features such as displaying pictures:

Lists are also pretty nice, as is bold and italic text:

  • bold
  • italic

Displaying code is a nice feature:

# Whether in python
import torch
1 + 1

# or R
library(ddml)
x <- 1

# or julia
use Pkg
Pkg.add(MyMethods.jl)

Last but not least, there should be some nice options for displaying math in-text – like $\beta$ – as well as via proper equations: \begin{equation} \beta \sim \mathcal{N}(0,1) \end{equation}

Neat!
